product_name: Stanley Nesting Vacuum Mug and Water Bottle - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Compact and portable, the Stanley Nesting Vacuum Mug and Water Bottle are the perfect 2-in-1 solution for saving space in backpacks and cabinets. Nest the mug and water bottle together for storage or travel; separate when you're ready to hydrate. Vacuum-insulated mug keeps drinks hot for 3 hrs. 18/8 stainless-steel mug won't rust; naturally BPA-free. Stanley Nesting Vacuum Mug and Water Bottle are fully packable together or separate. Closeout.
short_description: Compact and portable, the Stanley Nesting Vacuum Mug and Water Bottle are the perfect 2-in-1 solution for saving space in backpacks and cabinets.
